Subject: StealthAUDIT upgrade to latest version
Description: I recently took over this system and need StealthAUDIT along with other Stealthbits applications to be upgraded to the latest version. (Support stated that a StealthAUDIT upgrade would cover the all application upgrades)
Next_Steps__c:
Awaiting reply from Customer.

I did not enabled Auto reply till now
Solution_Comment__c:
Upgraded the current version of Stealth application(s) running in the Environment:

FROM:
StealthAUDIT (SA)                            11.5.0.279
Access Information Center (AIC)       11.5.0.138
Sensitive Data Add-On (SDD)            11.5.0.65

TOP:
Netwrix Enterprise Auditor (NEA)    11.6.0.142
Access Information (AIC)                  11.6.0.37
Sensitive Data Discovery (SDD)       11.6.0.18

Netwrix Enterprise Auditor v11.6 > Installation > Installation & Configuration Overview > Enterprise Auditor Console Upgrade
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Install/Application/Upgrade/Overview.htm
Netwrix Access Information Center 11.6 > Installation Overview > Upgrade Procedure
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/AIC_11.6/page/Content/Access/InformationCenter/Installation/Upgrade.htm

Recommended for the CPU 8 vCores and 500GB Drive size for the Working folder and PageFile.sys Disk E:.
Netwrix Enterprise Auditor v11.6 > Requirements > File System Solution
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Requirements/Solutions/FileSystem.htm#File
